    • queryJsons

      public String queryJsons(String ooquery) throws IOException, ReasoningException, InterruptedException, SemReasonerException
      query for jsons
      In contrast to find jsons, query jsons combines jsons from triples.
      By that way rules can create new jsons, or properties of jsons
      Parameters:
      ooquery -
      _core -
